text: Robert Noyce, Andy Grove and Gordon Moore incorporated Moore and Noyce electronics, swiftly renamed at Noyce's daughter's suggestion to Integrated Electronics Corporation, or Intel for short.

Silvano de Gennaro, an IT developer at CERN took a picture of the singing group 'Les Horribles Cernettes' who sang mostly about physics. Tim Berners-Lee would later use that picture as a test, making it the first photo uploaded to the World Wide Web.
Apple announced Mac OS X 10.1 Puma, the first update to OS X.
